repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: International Longshoremen's Association New York District Council Records
did.abstract: The papers cover the years 1955 and 1956 during which the International Longshoremen's Association negotiated a new agreement with the New York Shipping Association and opposed the employment stabilization program of the Waterfront Commission.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The International Longshoremen's Association opposed the employment stabilization program of the Waterfront Commission.
Correspondence, hearings, newspaper clippings, and other material relating to negotiations is included.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: International Longshoremen's Association New York District Council Records #5261. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5078: New York Shipping Association and the International Longshoremen's Association Records 5089: U.S. National Mediation Board Records Regarding General Managers Association of New York and the International Longshoremen's Association, Lighter Captains Union, Local 996 5116: International Longshoremen's Association, United Marine Division, Local 333 and Quality Transportation Corp. et.al. Records 5559: International Longshoremen's Association Dock Strike Clippings 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6308: William Donohue Collection of International Longshoremen's Association Local 1286 Papers
